data.title: SPAM: Hu-Sawicki f(R) gravity imprints search
data.name: spam
data.description: spam is a Python 3 package, used to search for imprints of Hu-Sawicki f(R) gravity in the rotation curves of the SPARC sample.

evidence: “`spam` is a python-3 package to search for imprints of Hu-Sawicki f(R) gravity on the rotation curves of the SPARC sample, using the MCMC sampler emcee.”
Usage example shows `import spam` and then using `spam.data.SPARCGalaxy` and `spam.fit.GalaxyFit`, indicating it is used as an importable Python package rather than a standalone executable.

“This code was used to generate the results in Naik et al., (2019).” and “All of the `spam` output data analysed in the paper can be found here… The scripts used to generate all of the figures in the paper can be found in the submodule `spam.plot`.”
